scripts.postinstall: npm run setup-babel && npm run copy-libs
scripts.setup-symlink: rm -rf src/lib/polythene && mkdir -p src/lib && cd .. && ln -s "$(pwd)/lib/" examples/src/lib/polythene
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-es6
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-css && npm run transpile-js
scripts.github: rm -rf ../../gh-pages-examples/app && rm -rf ../../gh-pages-examples/*.html && rm -rf ../../gh-pages-examples/lib && rm -rf ../../gh-pages-examples/config.js && npm run build && npm run build-copy-to-gh
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./build && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./src/lib && find ./src/app -name "*.js" -not -name "*.es6.js" -print | xargs rm -rf && find ./src/app -name "*.css" -print | xargs rm -rf
